Operation 'discovery.apis.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks details about what data is returned and what parameters are available. Improved version specifies this is for Google APIs, mentions the return structure includes metadata, and indicates parameter support for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Retrieve the list of APIs supported at this endpoint.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all Google APIs available through the Discovery Service. Returns metadata for each API including name, version, and description. Supports optional filtering and pagination parameters to narrow results.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks details about what data is returned and what parameters are available. Improved version specifies this is for Google APIs, mentions the return structure includes metadata, and indicates parameter support for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'discovery.apis.getRest' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about required parameters (api and version), what the RestDescription object contains, and the structured nature of the response. Enhanced version explicitly mentions path parameters, the response schema type, and what information is included to help AI agents understand the operation's scope and utility.

data.current_description: Retrieve the description of a particular version of an api.
data.summary_suggestion: Get REST API description for specific version
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete REST API description for a specified API and version. Requires the API name and version as path parameters. Returns a RestDescription object containing detailed information about all resources, methods, parameters, and schemas available in that API version.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about required parameters (api and version), what the RestDescription object contains, and the structured nature of the response. Enhanced version explicitly mentions path parameters, the response schema type, and what information is included to help AI agents understand the operation's scope and utility.
